features: Soothing Butter Lotion: Nourishes and hydrates skin with a lightweight, non-greasy formula that absorbs quickly leaving the perfect level of moisture on skin with silky, smooth radiance.
Refreshing Citrus Blend Scent: The invigorating harmony of sparkling grapefruit and vibrant orange lifted with refreshing accents of juicy lime and bergamot will leave you feeling revitalized.

Naturally Derived Ingredients: Enriched with a decadent blend of shea butter, vitamin E, aloe vera and pure botanical extracts to deeply hydrate and soothe dry skin. Toxin-free formula is paraben, sulfate, phosphate and gluten-free.
Cruelty-Free Body Care: Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals is PETA-certified, 100% vegan and never tested on animals so you can feel good while using it.
Economical & Eco-Friendly: Gallon refill size helps reduce plastic consumption and is perfect for locker rooms, health clubs, spas or at home. 1 Gallon (128 fl oz)
body.description: Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Champagne Mimosa Soothing Butter Lotion nourishes and moisturizes skin leaving a silky-smooth radiance. Lightweight, non-greasy formula penetrates deeply into the skin’s surface to improve texture and reduce roughness and cracking. Our citrus scented butter lotion is formulated with vitamin E, shea butter and aloe vera for all day hydration. Naturally derived botanicals help prevent, protect and hydrate dry skin and replenish moisture for softer more radiant skin. Contains no harsh chemicals like parabens, sulfates, phosphates or gluten. Cruelty-free, PETA-certified and 100% vegan. Recommended for use right out of shower. Refill size is perfect for fitness centers, hotels, spas and home use. Directions: Apply Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Soothing Butter Lotion generously and massage into skin. Repeat if desired.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Soothing Butter Lotions Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Champagne Mimosa, Island Tranquility and Coco Mango Soothing Butter Lotions are formulated with vitamin E, shea butter and aloe vera. This soothing body butter lotion nourishes and moisturizes skin leaving the skin with silky-smooth radiance. Paraben, sulfate, phosphate, gluten, cruelty-free, and 100% vegan. Butter Lotion (128 ounces) is perfect for commercial use in locker rooms and even for home use for refills. Rich and Decadent Formula Lightweight, Yet Moisturizing Vitamin E, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera Perfect for Dry Elbows, Mani’s and Pedi’s 100% Vegan Cruelty-Free 128 Ounces

Lotion has a rich and decadent formula and is lightweight enough to leave the perfect level of moisture on skin. Butter Lotion is 100% vegan and free of parabens, sulfate, phosphate, gluten and is cruelty-free. Soothing Butter Lotion is formulated with Vitamin E, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera which leaves the skin with a silky-smooth radiance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good lotion, great deal
reviews.reviewText: This is a good lotion. I generally rub body lotion everywhere immediately after a shower, and as not a small person this takes up a lot of it. Having a giant container of it really helps as the smaller bottles I'd end up using in about a week with two showers a day. The champagne mimosa smell is good, sweet and fragrant but not too overly perfumey. It also seems to moisturize well, isn't just water like some discount large-sized bottles. One morning application has left my skin ash-free all day. The gallon container does not have a pump, however, so plan on putting this into smaller containers if you want to make usage easier. Overall, I recommend highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will purchase again!
reviews.reviewText: After spending so much money on cheaper lotions that sit on the skin, leave a residue, and run out after 2 uses— I went to search for bulk lotion. I did not have high hopes, but I love this stuff. If you have a salon or super dry skin, I highly suggest you check this out. It soaks into the skin, it’s super moisturizing, and does not leave a film. Additionally, it smells great! It is better than any body lotion I’ve tried in a while (Cerve, Hemp’s, Neutrogena, Philosophy, The Body Shop, and First Aid Beauty). It is similar to Olay Nourishing & Hydrating Body Lotion and reminds me of some of my favorite face creams in the way it soaks into the skin: Peter Thomas Roth, It Cosmetics, and way better than any bulk body lotion or there is simply no difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go-to for body lotion. Provides impressive quality at roughly half the retail cost.
reviews.reviewText: I am a licensed esthetician. Despite this, I use the most cost effective products on my own skin because no one has $40 to spend on expensive facial serums. I also have eczema which causes atopic dermatitis on my hands, so washing them so often leaves them dry and painful.After experimenting with different moisturizers, I settled on using Dermasil-branded lotion and had to buy new bottles of it every week. Then I thought to myself, "Can I find body lotion for cheaper online?"The answer is yes. I did the math, and the bottle of lotion I was using costed roughly 50% more per oz. So initially, this was the most cost effective solution I could find.I ordered a gallon of lotion from another brand before this one, and I have to say that the Ginger Lily lotion is far better quality. It's thick but doesn't leave a residue on the skin like Dermasil or coconut oil might, and it doesn't sting even in spots where my skin has split from eczema. When I use it, the cracking I tend to get on my heels clears right up, which saves time on having to do foot soaks or exfoliating treatments.If anyone is wondering how the lotion smells, it's fruity with heavy citrus notes. The consistency isn't what I would consider watery, and the fragrance doesn't fade too quickly. I use it in place of perfume.No one at my house purchases their own lotion anymore because they always ask to borrow mine now. This includes my mother who is very particular about fragrance and only used a particular lotion that got discontinued.It is shipped in a standard box with no padding, though I have never received a bottle that leaked or was open. The only downside is that the bottle does not come with a pump, so you'll have to squeeze it into smaller containers or do what I do and just pour it straight from the gallon.This product is my go-to when it comes to purchasing body lotion. If this brand released more fruit fragrances, I would definitely be interested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not easy to pour into a small opening container
reviews.reviewText: Product smells amazing and is light on my face when applied. It is smooth and refreshing. It does not pour into containers with small openings. The consistency of this is like yogurt. Does not flow into containers easily. Careful with where you are wanting it to go! I had to place lotion in a plastic bag and cut the end like I was frosting a cake to get it into my lotion dispenser. Just an FYI

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing hand cream
reviews.reviewText: This is a great find! Lotion is thick and very moisturizing with a pleasant and mild scent. Great value and I love being able to refill containers versus buying replacements.Regarding the lack of pump, I just drilled a hole into the lid. It is painless to get the lotion into all my dispensers. I wish they had this on subscribe and save. 😢

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I enjoy the large jug.
reviews.reviewText: I think the lotion itself is wonderful but particularly enjoy the gallon jug to save on smaller bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Refill container but lotion is too thick to pour into small containers
reviews.reviewText: Lotion smells lovely. However, this gallon was purchased to refill my lotion dispensers for my bathrooms. I had to use the pump from another lotion bottle to pump it into the bottles…which took forever. For that reason, I only gave it 3 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this is the best value i have found. the product is not watered down, has a mild scent, and the price is right!
